inclusion.criterion: parent/legal guardian and subject must be able to speak and understand English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient must be willing and able to give assent to take part in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with asthma for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: able to demonstrate inhalation technique with study device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: if taking inhaled corticosteroids, dose must be stable for 2 weeks
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: past or present history of any allergic reaction to any of the medications or formulations administered in this study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness. She lost interest in activities she used to enjoy.
